name: Strato-Spear
storyline:
VT finds herself separated from her ship on an alien planet. It's close by, but she'll need to fight her way through an island full of hostile alien life to get back to it.

It should be no problem, once she finds her spear.
summary: Strato-Spear is an 3d character action/hack and slash game, with freeform combos and movement. It is inspired by games like Devil May Cry and Super Smash Bros.
